title: Henrietta Rix on sacrificing her work-life balance to turn Rixo into a global fashion success
text:
Henrietta Rix is one half of Rixo, the London-based fashion label which has gained a cult following since it launched in 2015. Here, she talks through the reality of running a new fashion brand, the impact on her work-life balance, and how she makes it work...

"My alarm goes off at 7am, and the first thing I do when I wake up is go on Instagram. I scroll through the pictures customers have tagged us in overnight.

I live with my best friend, and Rixo co-founder, Orlagh [McCloskey] and have done since we were at university in London together. We each have a black Americano with hot oat milk before we walk to the office for 9am.

Every day is different. Orlagh heads up design, so I look after...
